002291.SZ.summary: Saturday Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets footwear products primarily in Mainland China. It offers its products under the ST&SAT, FBL, SAFIYA, MOOFFY, RIZZO, IIXVIIX, and GAVAKLAS brand names. The company was formerly known as Foshan Saturday Shoes Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saturday Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Saturday Co., Ltd. is based in Foshan, China.

002395.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd
002395.SZ.summary: Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells artificial and synthetic leather products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers micro fiber leather products, including microfiber shoe, furniture, automotive trim, case and bag, cleaning, and ball leather products; and micro fiber suede, as well as microfiber package leather for ornaments. It also provides PU synthetic leather products, such as PU shoe, furniture, automotive upholstery, case and bag, vanity, ball, garment, and glove leather products, as well as PU wiping leather for wine boxes. In addition, the company offers PVC artificial leather products comprising PVC shoe, case and bag, vanity, furniture, garment, ball, automotive trim, glove, and mahjong table upper leather products, as well as semi-PU embossed leather and PVC flocking products. Further, it provides plastic films. The company also exports its products in Asia, Europe, Americas, Africa, and Oceania. Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China. Wuxi Double Elephant Micro Fibre Material Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Jiangsu Shuangxiang Group.

0210.HK.summary: Daphne International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, distributes, and retails footwear and accessories in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company offers its products under own brands, the Daphne and Shoebox, as well as brands under exclusive distributorships. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 425 points-of-sale (POS), including 360 POS under its core brands business and 65 POS under its other brands business. It is also involved in the e-commerce and property holding businesses. The company was formerly known as Prime Success International Group Limited and changed its name to Daphne International Holdings Limited in June 2008. Daphne International Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1027.HK.summary: China Jicheng Holdings Limited manufactures and sells POE umbrellas, nylon umbrellas, and umbrella parts in the People's Republic of China. It offers umbrella parts, such as plastic cloth and shafts. China Jicheng Holdings Limited also exports its products to Japan, Hong Kong, South Korea, Taiwan, Spain, and Cambodia. The company was formerly known as Jicheng Umbrella Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Jicheng Holdings Limited in June 2015. China Jicheng Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China.

1121.HK.long_name: Baofeng Modern International Holdings Company Limited
1121.HK.summary: Baofeng Modern International Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in footwear products in the People's Republic of China, the United States, South America, Europe, South East Asia, and internationally. The company operates through Boree Branded Products, Graphene-based Products, and Original Equipment Manufacturer segments. It offers slippers, sandals, and casual footwear under the Boree brand name. The company also manufactures and sells graphene-based ethylene-vinyl acetate foam material, deodorizing and sterilizing chips for air purifiers and air conditioners, and pressure-sensitive sensors. In addition, it produces slippers for branding and resale by others; trades in slippers; and provides management services. Baofeng Modern International Holdings Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300218.SZ.long_name: Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd.
300218.SZ.summary: Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polyurethane synthetic leather and polyurethane resins in China. The company's products are used in men's and women's, sports leisure, children's, safety, work, and fashion shoes, as well as sofa furniture, chairs, massage chairs, household and engineering decorations, handbags, suitcases, credentials, stationery, packaging and electronic packaging, ball and sport goods, belts, ticket folders, automotive interiors, etc. It also exports its products to 70 countries and regions internationally. The company was formerly known as Anhui ANLI Artificial Leather Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Anhui Anli Material Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Hefei, China.

300321.SZ.long_name: Shandong Tongda Island New Materials Co.,Ltd.
300321.SZ.summary: Shandong Tongda Island New Materials Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells microfiber leather products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers sport shoe, labor shoe, and furnishings material, as well as auto, speed tail, airplane seat, and inner decoration. It also provides bags and case, belt, shoe lining, and microfiber for gloves. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Changyi, the People's Republic of China.

300577.SZ.summary: Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various travel luggage products worldwide. Its products include backpacks, briefcases, and sleeves; templates of smartphones and PADs; luggage; and outdoor and sports products. The company offers its products under the 90FUN and GUILDFORD brands. Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Chuzhou, China.

300591.SZ.summary: Guangdong Wanlima Industry Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and retails leather products in the People's Republic of China. It offers men and women shoes, handbags, suitcases wallets, belts, gloves, and other products in the People's Republic of China. The company markets its products under the WANLIMA, Saint Jack, OILILY, and COOME brands. It also operates flagship stores, store shops, counters, and other terminal stores. Guangdong Wanlima Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300901.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zoenn Design Co., Ltd., a footwear design company, designs, develops, and sells shoes in China. It offers men's, women's and children's shoes and other footwear design services; and luggage, clothing, household supplies, fashion accessories, and other fashion design products and services. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

603001.SS.summary: Zhejiang Aokang Shoes Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and retails shoes, clothes, leather goods, bags, and other products in China. The company offers its products under the Aokang, Kanglong, Beautiful beauty, and Red Firebird brands. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Yongjia, China.

603116.SS.long_name: Zhejiang Red Dragonfly Footwear Co., Ltd.
603116.SS.summary: Zhejiang Red Dragonfly Footwear Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells shoes for men, women, and children in China. It also offers accessories and shoe care products. The company sells its products under the Red Dragonfly brand name. It also offers its products online. Zhejiang Red Dragonfly Footwear Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

603477.SS.long_name: Leshan Giantstar Farming & Husbandry Corporation Limited
603477.SS.summary: Leshan Giantstar Farming & Husbandry Corporation Limited engages in the research, production, and sale of leather and leather products in China. The company offers car seat, upholstery bag, furniture, and decorative leather products. It also operates online store for its products. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Zhenjing Corporation Limited and changed its name to Leshan Giantstar Farming & Husbandry Corporation in August 2020. Leshan Giantstar Farming & Husbandry Corporation was founded in 1993 and is based in Leshan, China.

603555.SS.summary: Guirenniao Co., Ltd. researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells sports shoes and apparel under the Guirenniao, AND1, and PRINCE brands in China and internationally. The company provides sports clothing, equipment, and accessories, as well as hats. It also sells its products online, as well as engages in the online store agency operation. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Xiamen, China.

603608.SS.summary: Topscore Fashion Co., Ltd. provides footwear products primarily in China. It offers leather, fur, and feather footwear products under the KISSCAT, Kiss Kitty, ZSAZSAZSU, Tigrisso, and Patricia brands. The company markets its products through physical channels, marketing outlets, and e-commerce channels. It operates approximately 2,000 marketing outlets. The company was formerly known as TopScore Fashion Shoes Co., Ltd. Topscore Fashion Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

603958.SS.summary: Harson Trading (China) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells shoes for women primarily in China. The company is based in Kunshan, China.

DPNEF.summary: Daphne International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, distributes, and retails footwear and accessories in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company offers its products under own brands, the Daphne and Shoebox, as well as brands under exclusive distributorships. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 425 points-of-sale (POS), including 360 POS under its core brands business and 65 POS under its other brands business. It is also involved in the e-commerce and property holding businesses. The company was formerly known as Prime Success International Group Limited and changed its name to Daphne International Holdings Limited in June 2008. Daphne International Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

PSX.F.summary: Daphne International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, distributes, and retails footwear and accessories in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company offers its products under own brands, the Daphne and Shoebox, as well as brands under exclusive distributorships. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 425 points-of-sale (POS), including 360 POS under its core brands business and 65 POS under its other brands business. It is also involved in the e-commerce and property holding businesses. The company was formerly known as Prime Success International Group Limited and changed its name to Daphne International Holdings Limited in June 2008. Daphne International Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

QING.summary: Qingdao Footwear, Inc. designs and retails branded footwear in Northern China. The company designs and sells men's and women's leather shoe lines under the Hongguan brand name. It operates stores in greater Qingdao. The company also markets its products through a distribution network of authorized independent distributors, as well as through third party retailers. Qingdao Footwear, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.
